Action.AddIRCMessage: !ANNOUNCEMENT! @Channel USER @#PLAYERNAME# has completed the assignment "Whitelist Bust" successfully!
Good job, @#PLAYERNAME#, it looks like the whitelist is down.
This should resolve the issues the merchants are having.
@Zaz, @#PLAYERNAME# HALP
LIVESTREAM MACHINE BROKE
PSYCHICS DID NOT SEE FORECOMING
What the... @Teseo, you're right, it's not working.
Let me run a few checks...
HURRY PLS
I pinged the server, I should get a reply back soon...
You've got to be kidding me...
What happen? Did someone set us up the bomb? We get signal?
@#PLAYERNAME#, the livestream is undergoing a severe Distributed Denial of Service Attack. And to make matters worse...
Ping Status for ToL Psychic Livestream Server has returned with the following error:
"ALL UR BASE R BELONG TO US - NOSCOPERZ"
/TABLEFLIP/
cmdrun/rage.bat -i
@Channel @Zaz says: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
@#PLAYERNAME#, Check the projects tab. We have some work to do and some squids to hunt.
@#PLAYERNAME# Such hack. Many ports. Wow.
Good Work, @#PLAYERNAME#. That was fast, and the livestream is up and running.
Now za warudo can behold the 1v1 Psychic battles! #thepowerisinyourmind #toshaketheplanets #andconquertime
I don't know why those script squids wanted to DDOS the livestream for the one on one battles for psychics. It's the Tournament of Legends!
It only happens once every five years- seriously, if the script squids are somehow participating in the tournament, then I hope they get banned. They're being seriously disrespectful.
!ANNOUNCEMENT! @#PLAYERNAME# has completed the Digital Rebels Demo.
GG WP NO RE
Excellent work, @#PLAYERNAME#. You might have seen some things that didn't make sense- but all will be explaned later.
For now? I'll leave it up to your imagination. Fair warning, though, the fourth wall will be a bit sturdier when the game is actually finished.
!ANNOUNCEMENT! @#PLAYERNAME# Please leave Feedback to CraftMasterMatt#6334 on Discord. Thank you for playing! -CRAFTMASTERMATT
